title: Medical electrical system (ME system)
fullText:
Combination of either medical equipment or multiple medical devices which may also include other non-medical equipment, having a specified function and connected by either a physical connection or an electrical interconnection. A multiple socket-outlets are example of an electrical connection.
NOTES:
1	The Medical electrical system includes those accessories that are needed for operating the system.
2	The medical electrical system may also include devices that are not within the patient area e.g. external printer, computer.
[Ref: AS/NZS 3551:2012]
